channel.title: Authors on Herb Susmann
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Herb Susmann

item.description: I grew up near Ithaca, New York, where I was home-schooled for elementary school, an experience that shaped my belief in the value of self-directed, intrinsically motivated learning. I went to college at SUNY Geneseo where I received a degree in Mathematics in 2014. I spent four years working as a software developer at Silent Spring Institute where I developed digital tools for communicating complex scientific data to a lay audience.
